metadata.title: Monthly Mean Precipitation and Temperature for the Arctic Regions of Russia (1891-1942)

creators.name: National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Environmental Satellite, Data

metadata.description: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.
